title: Presidential Nomination and Withdrawal Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 01, 2016

 



Presidential Nomination and Withdrawal Sent to the Senate





	NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:

	R. David Harden, of Maryland, to be an Assistant Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development, vice Nancy E. Lindborg.

	WITHDRAWAL SENT TO THE SENATE:

	John Morton, of Massachusetts, to be Executive Vice President of the Overseas Private Investment Corporation, vice Mimi E. Alemayehou, which was sent to the Senate on June 16, 2015.
